response.overview: "Vermësst!" is a gripping crime thriller that explores the limits of despair and courage. A woman is held captive in a remote house deep in the forest, and the drama intensifies when it is discovered she is the daughter of an elderly couple who recently won a lot of money in the lottery. The parents and the police are desperate to find her. The culprit, none other than the victim's husband, plans to take the money won by the parents as ransom to finance his escape from the country, aided in this sordid scheme by his mistress.
response.title: Vermësst!
